content: lolly beret by jennifer evans for the lamb & kid a jaunty accessory designed to make the most of our aran-weight alpaca and silk blend and one that weighs practically nothing atop your head tilt this shallow beret at a rakish angle for adventuring and maximum fun make one to match your sherbet bandana needles needle sizes are suggested please adjust for your gauge gauge needle us 7 4 5mm 16 / 40 cm circular and double-point needles ribbing needle us 6 4mm 16 / 40 cm circular needle tools bor marker darning needle optional seven additional markers in a different color from bor marker gauge 17 sts and 22 rounds = 4 in stockinette stitch in the round blocked lolly beret shown in dimond laine big birdie in color beret finished size abbreviations to fit an average adult head 20-21 in ears directions for beret ribbing rounds with ribbing needle cast on 80 sts join in the round without a twist and place bor ribbing round 1 k2 p2 around repeat ribbing round five more times 6 rounds
